title: Rogue Mobile App
description:
FortiRecon Brand Protection detects a mobile app whose status is **RogueApp**
Observe the following * Reported Information (Name, Source, Developer, Status, Size and Download Count) is presented as a handy reference * On receiving information from FortiRecon related to the Rogue Mobile App possibility, High Risk Rogue Mobile App Response Playbook activates and creates manual task to raise rogue mobile app takedown request.

Steps.name: Rogue Mobile App Response
Steps.preCreateMessage: Creating demo alert record when rogue mobile app found

title: Typo Squatting Domain
description:
FortiRecon Brand Protection detects a typo squatted domain whose severity score is **High**
Observe the following * Reported Information (Typo Domain, Original Domain, Severity Score and Status) is presented as a handy reference * On receiving information from FortiRecon related to Typo Squatting possibility, High Risk Typo Domain Response Playbook activates and creates manual tasks to raise typo domain takedown request.

Steps.name: High Risk Typo Domain Response
Steps.preCreateMessage: Creating demo alert record for newly found high risk typo domain
